name: Mi Media Holdings Limited (miRoamer)
tag_list: internet-radio, internet-media, iptv, streaming, streaming-radio, radio, internet, australia, internet-car-radio, car-radio, car
overview:
Imagine being able to access any radio or television channel from anywhere in the world live off your car radio or internet enabled product other than your desktop computer. Enter miRoamer who has had the passion, technology and innovative leadership to develop the next generation of media content delivery.

miRoamer have developed our very intelligent proprietary media platform and associated technology (as well as processes) that can be imbedded into any internet enabled product such as car radios, clock radios, home audio, digital picture frames smart phones and other media players which will provide for virtually all digital media content whether it be radio, internet TV, videos, pictures, and podcast.

To put it in its simplest form, miRoamer’s vision is to become the global standard digital media content provider for all Internet-enabled products.

Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM’s) and Brand Holders seeking critical competitive technical advantages at the high end of their premium product range, instantly harness an extra selling point for their product at minimal cost.

miRoamer’s rich intellectual property and technical process portfolio represents the next generation of media content delivery which it is sweeping the world.

MiRoamer’s Corporate Headquarters are in Doncaster, a suburb of Melbourne, Australia, and we have a sales office in the USA. The Company plans to open a European office in late 2009.
